com.SocScore.framework

Class ScoreKeeper

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.SocScore.framework.AnalysisViewer
      • com.SocScore.framework.scorekeeper.ScoreKeeper
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BatchInput, LiveInput

    public abstract class ScoreKeeper
extends AnalysisViewer
    Abstract class which contains methods shared between the Match Input classes.
    See Also:
    LiveInput, BatchInput

    • Field Detail

      • MATCHES

        final java.util.List<Match> MATCHES
        ArrayList of Match objects, used to temporarily store matches being monitored by the Score Keeping class using it.

        Note that these matches are not stored in the league until you call a transfer method on them.

        See Also:
        Match, LiveInput.endMatch(), BatchInput.addAllMatchesToLeague()

      • currentMatch

        Match currentMatch

      • hasUnsavedMatches
